name: Around the Galaxy and Back
description:
“A road-trip (space-trip?) with internet friends is bound to end in disaster, right? Ferra thought so too, but here she is.

A journey to all the hotspots of the galaxy awaits, with all the potential to be a total bust or a total miracle. Around the galaxy and back, what will change between them, if anything?”

Features:

- 10,000+ words!

- Multiple routes!

- Cute original art, cool original music, just nice everything! :D

The Team:

BibiXP (Twitter) (Itch)  - Responsible for Music/Programming.

Drakka (Twitter) (Itch)  - Responsible for Writing/UI.

CabinDraws (Deviantart) - Responsible for Art (Characters and Backgrounds)
